pages.text: $(d)Portkeys$() will instantly teleport the player to a set location when they're picked up off the ground.$(br2)To set the location, $(3)click the Portkey on the ground$(), which will make it start glowing. Throw it on the ground and it will activate after several seconds, which will make it stop glowing.$(br2)The only limit is that it cannot cross dimensions. The Portkey is also $(c)consumed upon use$().
pages.title: Portkey

pages.text: Additionally, you can $(3)craft the Portkey with any other item$() to disguise it. The dropped item will look like the disguise rather than the Portkey itself.
